amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the base Defense Department budget by 1% excluding military/reserve/National Guard personnel, as well as Defense Health Program account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to reduce the base Defense Department budget by 1% excluding military/reserve/National Guard personnel, as well as Defense Health Program account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 73 - 351 (Roll no. 357).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 73 - 351 (Roll no. 357).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Polis.
